short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Free/Open source url shortener from https://theopensuite.com.  Easily generate shortened links to share with anyone.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
openLink is a simple, free, easy to use URL shortener from THe Open Suite.  The official openLink extension allows you to quickly and easily generate a shortened url from any website without leaving the current page/tab.

openLink uses a custom, open source, lightning fast URL shortening service with a backend written in NodeJS.  Our URL shortening service is completely free.  We do no advertising and we don't collect any personal information.  No account is needed to use our URL shortener!

Simply enter a url into the input field and click the "Get Link" button.  You will instantly receive a short url!  Simple, quick and secure.  Check out more of our tools at https://theopensuite.com
